Michael Vick , who enjoyed a breakout 2010 campaign, repeatedly has said he wants to stay in Philadelphia. We'll see what happens over the next couple months, he said earlier in the week as he prepared to play in his fourth Pro Bowl.`` I just got to be patient and take it day by day.'' the Bobcats with Allen Iverson spraining his right ankle and Carmelo Anthony spraining his left wrist. Carmelo Anthony said he's sore but fine and will play Wednesday night at Portland. Allen Iverson sounded a lot less confident in his status. The way I feel right now, I don't know if I would miss a game. I just will have to get up and see how I feel tomorrow, Allen Iverson said.`` Right now it's just frustrating to be out there at the end hobbling like that.'' Micah Zenko , a political scientist at the Council on Foreign Relations, extensively researched U.S. planning for a military strike on Khurmal in 2002 and detailed it in his book Between Threats and War. He said in an interview that he was unaware that Rumsfeld had advocated bombing the place while Colin Powell was at the U.N. By that time, the Khurmal camp had been largely empty for months, Micah Zenko said.
